entry.title: Welcome To My Website
entry.content:
This is the first post in my website, so this is meant to be both a test –I'm testing how does this works– and an introduction for the reader. This webpage is a personal and professional profile, here I will post things I do related to Data Science, professional information like my portfolio, my CV and, why not, posts in a less formal style to express opinions or whatnot.
For those who don't know me I would like to present myself. I'm a Data Science and Engineering student at UPC, in Barcelona. I'm interested in Artificial Intelligence, Data Analysis and Data Science in general. I also like the more computational part of what I'm studying, like algorithmics and programming per se. I use python most of the time but I also know R, C++, SQL, unfortunately Matlab, learning HTML. I think when you have a general idea of what programming is, learning a new language is similar to learning a new python library.
Aside from my interests related to my sudy field, I also want to add other things I enjoy to make it more personal. I always loved playing music, I play the saxophone and the guitar. I'm not a good singer but sometimes I play guitar and sing with friends. I also enjoy camping and hicking, either by the sea or by the mountain, what I like the most of this is the contact with nature.

I hope this worked as a personal and website presentation. If you need to contact me, feel free to mail me or contact me through Linkedin ;).
